entry.title: hexo的博客搭建
entry.content:
hexo博客的搭建

第一篇博客

NodeList proListtss = rootEle.getElementsByTagName("artifacts");            // xml解析            for (int i = 0; i < proListtss.getLength(); i++) {                Element proEles = (Element)proListtss.item(i);                String size = proEles.getAttribute("size");                System.out.println(size);                NodeList protList = proEles.getElementsByTagName("artifact");                for (int j = 0; j < protList.getLength(); j++) {                    Element item = (Element)protList.item(j);                    String name = item.getAttribute("classifier");                    String value = item.getAttribute("version");                    System.out.println(name + ", " + value);                    NodeList ppoList = item.getElementsByTagName("properties");                    Element item2 = (Element)ppoList.item(0);                    String size2 = item2.getAttribute("size");                    System.out.println(size2);                    NodeList ppList = item2.getElementsByTagName("property");                    Element item3 = (Element)ppList.item(0);                    String attribute2 = item3.getAttribute("property");                    System.out.println(attribute2);                }                   NodeList proListtss = rootEle.getElementsByTagName("artifacts");            // xml解析            for (int i = 0; i < proListtss.getLength(); i++) {                Element proEles = (Element)proListtss.item(i);                String size = proEles.getAttribute("size");                System.out.println(size);                NodeList protList = proEles.getElementsByTagName("artifact");                for (int j = 0; j < protList.getLength(); j++) {                    Element item = (Element)protList.item(j);                    String name = item.getAttribute("classifier");                    String value = item.getAttribute("version");                    System.out.println(name + ", " + value);                    NodeList ppoList = item.getElementsByTagName("properties");                    Element item2 = (Element)ppoList.item(0);                    String size2 = item2.getAttribute("size");                    System.out.println(size2);                    NodeList ppList = item2.getElementsByTagName("property");                    Element item3 = (Element)ppList.item(0);                    String attribute2 = item3.getAttribute("property");                    System.out.println(attribute2);                }                   NodeList proListtss = rootEle.getElementsByTagName("artifacts");            // xml解析            for (int i = 0; i < proListtss.getLength(); i++) {                Element proEles = (Element)proListtss.item(i);                String size = proEles.getAttribute("size");                System.out.println(size);                NodeList protList = proEles.getElementsByTagName("artifact");                for (int j = 0; j < protList.getLength(); j++) {                    Element item = (Element)protList.item(j);                    String name = item.getAttribute("classifier");                    String value = item.getAttribute("version");                    System.out.println(name + ", " + value);                    NodeList ppoList = item.getElementsByTagName("properties");                    Element item2 = (Element)ppoList.item(0);                    String size2 = item2.getAttribute("size");                    System.out.println(size2);                    NodeList ppList = item2.getElementsByTagName("property");                    Element item3 = (Element)ppList.item(0);                    String attribute2 = item3.getAttribute("property");                    System.out.println(attribute2);                }

entry.title: Hello World
entry.content:
Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub.

大主题

Create a new post

More info: Writing

Run server

More info: Server

Generate static files

Deploy to remote sites

More info: Deployment
